phase_1.name: Auth Options Inventory
phase_1.description: Document Claude flow, research Codex/Gemini CLI auth modes

phase_2.name: Codex Auth Path
phase_2.description: Implement Codex OAuth, CLIProxy fallback, adapter enforcement

phase_3.name: Gemini Auth Path
phase_3.description: Implement Gemini OAuth, API key fallback, CLIProxy, adapter enforcement

phase_4.name: Shared Auth Utilities
phase_4.description: Auth resolver helper, config schema, diagnostics

phase_5.name: Adapter Wiring
phase_5.description: Wire Codex/Gemini adapters, simulation mode bypass

phase_6.name: Testing
phase_6.description: Unit tests, integration docs, proxy smoke tests

phase_7.name: Documentation
phase_7.description: README updates, CLI docs, troubleshooting guide

phase_8.name: Rollout Safety
phase_8.description: Default simulation mode, verify Claude unchanged, actionable errors

notes: Project initialized by initializer agent. All 106 issues created (105 feature issues + 1 META issue). Issues are organized by phase with proper dependencies. Work should start with Phase 1 (research tasks) before moving to implementation phases.
